interestingcomments.content: Jonathan's software is an existence proof that much, if not all, of the problem can be fixed in post. Therefore, it could be fixed in Lr. Eric Chan, are you monitoring this forum? Jim Alternatively, you and Jonathan could team up to produce a LR plug-in. I'll bet a fair number of people would happily pay a small fee to download it. If it is a problem for many that may push Leica to address it with a firmware update. If it is a problem for only a few at least those few would have a solution. Either way you guys would be compensated for all the time you seem to have spent on this.
